message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob.  However, the value of this product to me is quite high.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you at $10,500. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
